placeholders.selectLanguage: Select a language to switch to

info.label: Info
info.description: Please customize the page appearance and click on "export" to continue.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: You can change the document appearance by choosing a theme or create a handcrafted one.

headerFooter.label: Header & Footer
headerFooter.description: The text appear on all pages if header and/or footer is defined.

import.title: Import or Open
import.description: Drop here to get you stuff into MarkText

tweet.title: Send us feedback via tweet
tweet.reportViaGithub: Report bug or feature request via github

items.autoSave: Automatically save the content being edited
items.autoSaveDelay: The time in ms after a change that the file is saved
items.titleBarStyle: The title bar style (Windows and Linux system only)
items.openFilesInNewWindow: Open files in a new window
items.openFolderInNewWindow: Open folder via menu in a new window
items.zoom: The zoom level. Between 0.5 and 2.0 inclusive
items.wordWrapInToc: Whether to enable word wrap in TOC
items.fileSortBy: Sort files in opened folder by created time, modified time and title
items.startUpAction: The action after MarkText startup, open the last edited content, open the specified folder or blank page
items.defaultDirectoryToOpen: The default directory that should be opened on startup when startUp=folder
items.editorLineWidth: Defines the maximum editor area width. An empty string or suffixes of ch (characters), px (pixels) or % (percentage) are allowed
items.codeFontSize: Font size in code Block, the range is 12 ~ 18
items.codeFontFamily: Font family used in code block
items.codeBlockLineNumbers: Whether to show the line numbers
items.trimUnnecessaryCodeBlockEmptyLines: Trim the beginning and ending empty lines in code block
items.endOfLine: The newline character used at the end of each line. The default value is default, which selects your operating system's default newline character
items.autoGuessEncoding: Try to automatically guess the file encoding when opening files
items.hideQuickInsertHint: Hide hint for quickly creating paragraphs
items.hideLinkPopup: Hide link popup when the cursor is hover on the link
items.autoCheck: Whether to automatically check related task
items.bulletListMarker: The marker used in bullet list
items.orderListDelimiter: The dilimiter used in order list
items.preferHeadingStyle: The preferred heading style in MarkText
items.tabSize: Replace the tab with x spaces
items.superSubScript: Enable pandoc's markdown extension superscript and subscript
items.theme: Select the theme used in MarkText
items.autoSwitchTheme: Automatically adjust application theme according system
items.customCss: Custom CSS to apply to the current theme
items.imageInsertAction: The default behavior after insert image from local folder
items.imagePreferRelativeDirectory: Whether to prefer the relative image directory
items.sideBarVisibility: Whether the side bar is visible
items.sourceCodeModeEnabled: Whether the source-code mode is enabled by default
items.searchExclusions: List of glob patterns to exclude from search
items.searchMaxFileSize: The maximal file size (<maxFileSize><suffix>). Suffixes of K, M or G are allowed if not suffix is given the number is treated as bytes
items.searchIncludeHidden: Whether to search in hidden files and directories
items.searchNoIgnore: Whether to ignore ignore files like .gitignore
items.watcherUsePolling: Whether to use polling. Polling may leads to high CPU utilization but is necessary to watch files over a network

dualScreenMode.title: Dual Screen Mode
dualScreenMode.enabledDescription: Enables side-by-side view with source code on the left and live preview on the right. Only available in source code mode.
